   20: 
   21: -module(trace_local_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([basic_test/0, bit_syntax_test/0, return_test/0,
   24: 	 on_and_off_test/0, stack_grow_test/0,
   25: 	 info_test/0, delete_test/1, exception_test/1]).
   26: 
   27: -export([exported/1, exported_wrap/1, loop/4, apply_slave_async/5,
   28: 	 match/2, clause/2, id/1, undef/1, lists_reverse/2]).
   29: 
   30: 
   31: %%
   32: %% Define for debug output
   33: %%
   34: %%-define(debug,1).
   35:  
   36: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   37: -define(DEFAULT_RECEIVE_TIMEOUT, infinity).
   38: 
   39: -ifdef(debug).
   40: -define(dbgformat(A,B),io:format(A,B)).
   41: -else.
   42: -define(dbgformat(A,B),noop).
   43: -endif.
   44: 
   45: %%% When run in test server %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   46: 
   47: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   48:          basic/1, bit_syntax/1,
   49:          return/1, on_and_off/1, systematic_on_off/1,
   50:          stack_grow/1,info/1, delete/1,
   51:          exception/1, exception_apply/1,
   52:          exception_function/1, exception_apply_function/1,
   53:          exception_nocatch/1, exception_nocatch_apply/1,
   54:          exception_nocatch_function/1, exception_nocatch_apply_function/1,
   55:          exception_meta/1, exception_meta_apply/1,
   56:          exception_meta_function/1, exception_meta_apply_function/1,
   57:          exception_meta_nocatch/1, exception_meta_nocatch_apply/1,
   58:          exception_meta_nocatch_function/1,
   59:          exception_meta_nocatch_apply_function/1,
   60:          concurrency/1,
   61:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   62: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   63:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   64: 
   65: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   66:     trace_sessions:init_per_suite(Config).
   67: 
   68: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   69:     trace_sessions:end_per_suite(Config).
   70: 
   71: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   72:     trace_sessions:init_per_group(Group, Config).
   73: 
   74: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   75:     trace_sessions:end_per_group(Group, Config).
   76: 
   77: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   78:     Config.
   79: 
   80: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   81:     shutdown(),
   82: 
   83:     %% Reloading the module will clear all trace patterns, and
   84:     %% in a debug-compiled emulator run assertions of the counters
   85:     %% for the number of functions with breakpoints.
   86:     c:l(?MODULE),
   87: 
   88:     trace_sessions:end_per_testcase(Config).
   89: 
   90: erlang_trace(A,B,C) ->
   91:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace(A,B,C).
   92: 
   93: erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C) ->
   94:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C).
   95: 
   96: erlang_trace_info(A,B) ->
   97:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_info(A,B).
   98: 
   99: 
  100: suite() ->
  101:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
  102:      {timetrap, {minutes, 2}}].
  103: 
  104: all() ->
  105:     trace_sessions:all().
  106: 
  107: groups() ->
  108:     trace_sessions:groups(testcases()).
  109: 
  110: testcases() ->
  111:     [basic, bit_syntax, return, on_and_off, systematic_on_off,
  112:      stack_grow,
  113:      info, delete, exception, exception_apply,
  114:      exception_function, exception_apply_function,
  115:      exception_nocatch, exception_nocatch_apply,
  116:      exception_nocatch_function,
  117:      exception_nocatch_apply_function, exception_meta,
  118:      exception_meta_apply, exception_meta_function,
  119:      exception_meta_apply_function, exception_meta_nocatch,
  120:      exception_meta_nocatch_apply,
  121:      exception_meta_nocatch_function,
  122:      exception_meta_nocatch_apply_function,
  123:      concurrency].
  124: 
  125: %% Tests basic local call-trace
  126: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  127:     basic_test().
  128: 
  129: %% OTP-7399: Make sure that code that uses the optimized bit syntax matching
  130: %% can be traced without crashing the emulator.
  131: bit_syntax(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  132:     bit_syntax_test().
  133: 
  134: %% Tests the different types of return trace
  135: return(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  136:     return_test().
  137: 
  138: %% Tests turning trace parameters on and off,
  139: %% both for trace and trace_pattern
  140: on_and_off(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  141:     on_and_off_test().
  142: 
  143: %% Tests the stack growth during return traces
  144: stack_grow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  145:     stack_grow_test().
  146: 
  147: %% Tests the trace_info BIF
  148: info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  149:     info_test().
  150: 
  151: %% Tests putting trace on deleted modules
  152: delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  153:     delete_test(Config).
  154: 
  155: %% Tests exception_trace
  156: exception(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  157:     exception_test([]).
  158: 
  159: %% Tests exception_trace
  160: exception_apply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  161:     exception_test([apply]).
  162: 
  163: %% Tests exception_trace
  164: exception_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  165:     exception_test([function]).
  166: 
  167: %% Tests exception_trace
  168: exception_apply_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  169:     exception_test([apply,function]).
  170: 
  171: %% Tests exception_trace
  172: exception_nocatch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  173:     exception_test([nocatch]).
  174: 
  175: %% Tests exception_trace
  176: exception_nocatch_apply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  177:     exception_test([nocatch,apply]).
  178: 
  179: %% Tests exception_trace
  180: exception_nocatch_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  181:     exception_test([nocatch,function]).
  182: 
  183: %% Tests exception_trace
  184: exception_nocatch_apply_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  185:     exception_test([nocatch,apply,function]).
  186: 
  187: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  188: exception_meta(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  189:     exception_test([meta]).
  190: 
  191: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  192: exception_meta_apply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  193:     exception_test([meta,apply]).
  194: 
  195: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  196: exception_meta_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  197:     exception_test([meta,function]).
  198: 
  199: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  200: exception_meta_apply_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  201:     exception_test([meta,apply,function]).
  202: 
  203: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  204: exception_meta_nocatch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  205:     exception_test([meta,nocatch]).
  206: 
  207: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  208: exception_meta_nocatch_apply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  209:     exception_test([meta,nocatch,apply]).
  210: 
  211: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  212: exception_meta_nocatch_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  213:     exception_test([meta,nocatch,function]).
  214: 
  215: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  216: exception_meta_nocatch_apply_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  217:     exception_test([meta,nocatch,apply,function]).
  218: 
  219: 
  220: %%% Message patterns and expect functions %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  221: 
  222: -define(pCT(P,M,F,A),   {trace,   P,call,{M,F,A}}).
  223: -define(pCTT(P,M,F,A),  {trace_ts,P,call,{M,F,A},{_,_,_}}).
  224: -define(pRF(P,M,F,A,V), {trace,   P,return_from,{M,F,A},V}).
  225: -define(pRFT(P,M,F,A,V),{trace_ts,P,return_from,{M,F,A},V,{_,_,_}}).
  226: -define(pEF(P,M,F,A,V), {trace,   P,exception_from,{M,F,A},V}).
  227: -define(pEFT(P,M,F,A,V),{trace_ts,P,exception_from,{M,F,A},V,{_,_,_}}).
  228: -define(pRT(P,M,F,A),   {trace,   P,return_to,{M,F,A}}).
  229: -define(pRTT(P,M,F,A),  {trace_ts,P,return_to,{M,F,A},{_,_,_}}).
  230: 
  231: -define(CT(M,F,A),    ?pCT(_,M,F,A)    = receive_next()).
  232: -define(CTT(M,F,A),   ?pCTT(_,M,F,A)   = receive_next()).
  233: -define(RF(M,F,A,V),  ?pRF(_,M,F,A,V)  = receive_next()).
  234: -define(RFT(M,F,A,V), ?pRFT(_,M,F,A,V) = receive_next()).
  235: -define(EF(M,F,A,V),  ?pEF(_,M,F,A,V)  = receive_next()).
  236: -define(EFT(M,F,A,V), ?pEFT(_,M,F,A,V) = receive_next()).
  237: -define(RT(M,F,A),    ?pRT(_,M,F,A)    = receive_next()).
  238: -define(RTT(M,F,A),   ?pRTT(_,M,F,A)   = receive_next()).
  239: -define(NM, receive_no_next(100)).
  240: 
  241: expect() ->
  242:     {Pid,_} = get(slave),
  243:     expect_receive(Pid).
  244: 
  245: expect(Msg) ->
  246:     {Pid,_} = get(slave),
  247:     expect_pid(Pid, Msg).
  248: 
  249: 
  250: 
  251: expect_pid(_Pid, []) ->
  252:     ok;
  253: expect_pid(Pid, [Line|T]) when is_integer(Line) ->
  254:     put(test_server_loc, {?MODULE,Line}),
  255:     expect_pid(Pid, T);
  256: expect_pid(Pid, [true|[_|_]=T]) ->
  257:     expect_pid(Pid, T);
  258: expect_pid(Pid, [false|[_|T]]) ->
  259:     expect_pid(Pid, T);
  260: expect_pid(Pid, [H|T]) ->
  261:     expect_pid(Pid, H),
  262:     expect_pid(Pid, T);
  263: expect_pid(Pid, Msg) when is_tuple(Msg) ->
  264:     same(Msg, expect_receive(Pid));
  265: expect_pid(Pid, Fun) when is_function(Fun, 1) ->
  266:     case Fun(expect_receive(Pid)) of
  267:         next ->
  268:             expect_pid(Pid, Fun);
  269:         done ->
  270:             ok;
  271:         Other ->
  272:             expect_pid(Pid, Other)
  273:     end.
  274: 
  275: expect_receive(Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
  276:     receive
  277:         Msg when is_tuple(Msg), 
  278:                  element(1, Msg) == trace, 
  279:                  element(2, Msg) =/= Pid;
  280:                  %%
  281:                  is_tuple(Msg), 
  282:                  element(1, Msg) == trace_ts, 
  283:                  element(2, Msg) =/= Pid ->
  284:             expect_receive(Pid);
  285:         Msg ->
  286:             expect_msg(Pid, Msg)
  287:     after 100 ->
  288:               {nm}
  289:     end.
  290: 
  291: expect_msg(P, ?pCT(P,M,F,Args))       -> {ct,{M,F},Args};
  292: expect_msg(P, ?pCTT(P,M,F,Args))      -> {ctt,{M,F},Args};
  293: expect_msg(P, ?pRF(P,M,F,Arity,V))    -> {rf,{M,F,Arity},V};
  294: expect_msg(P, ?pRFT(P,M,F,Arity,V))   -> {rft,{M,F,Arity},V};
  295: expect_msg(P, ?pEF(P,M,F,Arity,V))    -> {ef,{M,F,Arity},V};
  296: expect_msg(P, ?pEFT(P,M,F,Arity,V))   -> {eft,{M,F,Arity},V};
  297: expect_msg(P, ?pRT(P,M,F,Arity))      -> {rt,{M,F,Arity}};
  298: expect_msg(P, ?pRTT(P,M,F,Arity))     -> {rtt,{M,F,Arity}};
  299: expect_msg(P, Msg) when is_tuple(Msg) ->
  300:     case tuple_to_list(Msg) of
  301:         [trace,P|T] ->
  302:             list_to_tuple([trace|T]);
  303:         [trace_ts,P|[_|_]=T] ->
  304:             list_to_tuple([trace_ts|reverse(tl(reverse(T)))]);
  305:         _ ->
  306:             Msg
  307:     end.
  308: 
  309: same(A, B) ->
  310:     case [A|B] of
  311:         [X|X] ->
  312:             ok
  313:     end.
  314: 
  315: 
  316: 
  317: %%% tests %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  318: 
  319: basic_test() ->
  320:     setup([call]),
  321:     NumMatches = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[local]),
  322:     NumMatches = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[local]),
  323:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  324:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  325:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  326:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported,[1]),
  327:     ?CT(?MODULE,local,[1]),
  328:     ?CT(?MODULE,local2,[1]),
  329:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  330:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[]),
  331:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  332:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  333:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  334:     [1,1,1,997] = lambda_slave(fun() ->
  335:                                        exported_wrap(1)
  336:                                end),
  337:     ?NM,
  338:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[local]),
  339:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  340:     [1,1,1,997] = lambda_slave(fun() ->
  341:                                        exported_wrap(1)
  342:                                end),
  343:     ?CT(?MODULE,_,_), %% The fun
  344:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  345:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported,[1]),
  346:     ?CT(?MODULE,local,[1]),
  347:     ?CT(?MODULE,local2,[1]),
  348:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  349:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},false,[local]),
  350:     shutdown(),
  351:     ?NM,
  352:     ok.
  353: 
  354: %% OTP-7399.
  355: bit_syntax_test() ->
  356:     setup([call]),
  357:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[local]),
  358:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  359: 
  360:     lambda_slave(fun() ->
  361:                          6 = bs_sum_a(<<1,2,3>>, 0),
  362:                          10 = bs_sum_b(0, <<1,2,3,4>>),
  363:                          26 = bs_sum_c(<<3:4,5:4,7:4,11:4>>, 0)
  364:                  end),
  365:     ?CT(?MODULE,_,[]),		      %Ignore call to the fun.
  366: 
  367:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_a,[<<1,2,3>>,0]),
  368:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_a,[<<2,3>>,1]),
  369:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_a,[<<3>>,3]),
  370:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_a,[<<>>,6]),
  371: 
  372:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_b,[0,<<1,2,3,4>>]),
  373:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_b,[1,<<2,3,4>>]),
  374:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_b,[3,<<3,4>>]),
  375:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_b,[6,<<4>>]),
  376:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_b,[10,<<>>]),
  377: 
  378:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<3:4,5:4,7:4,11:4>>, 0]),
  379:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<5:4,7:4,11:4>>, 3]),
  380:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<7:4,11:4>>, 8]),
  381:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<11:4>>, 15]),
  382:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<>>, 26]),
  383: 
  384:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},false,[local]),
  385:     shutdown(),
  386:     ?NM,
  387: 
  388:     ok.
  389: 
  390: bs_sum_a(<<H,T/binary>>, Acc) -> bs_sum_a(T, H+Acc);
  391: bs_sum_a(<<>>, Acc) -> Acc.
  392: 
  393: bs_sum_b(Acc, <<H,T/binary>>) -> bs_sum_b(H+Acc, T);
  394: bs_sum_b(Acc, <<>>) -> Acc.
  395: 
  396: bs_sum_c(<<H:4,T/bits>>, Acc) -> bs_sum_c(T, H+Acc);
  397: bs_sum_c(<<>>, Acc) -> Acc.
  398: 
  399: return_test() ->
  400:     setup([call]),
  401:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  402:                          [local]),
  403:     erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,'_'},[{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  404:                          [local]),
  405:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  406:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  407:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  408:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported,[1]),
  409:     ?CT(?MODULE,local,[1]),
  410:     ?CT(?MODULE,local2,[1]),
  411:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  412:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  413:     ?RF(erlang,phash2,2,997),
  414:     ?RF(?MODULE,local_tail,1,[1,997]),
  415:     ?RF(?MODULE,local2,1,[1,997]),
  416:     ?RF(?MODULE,local,1,[1,1,997]),
  417:     ?RF(?MODULE,exported,1,[1,1,1,997]),
  418:     ?RF(?MODULE,exported_wrap,1,[1,1,1,997]),
  419:     shutdown(),
  420:     setup([call,return_to]),
  421:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],
  422:                          [local]),
  423:     erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,'_'},[],
  424:                          [local]),
  425:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  426:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  427:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  428:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported,[1]),
  429:     ?CT(?MODULE,local,[1]),
  430:     ?CT(?MODULE,local2,[1]),
  431:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  432:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  433:     ?RT(?MODULE,local_tail,1),
  434:     ?RT(?MODULE,local,1),
  435:     ?RT(?MODULE,exported,1),
  436:     ?RT(?MODULE,slave,2),
  437:     shutdown(),
  438:     setup([call,return_to]),
  439:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  440:                          [local]),
  441:     erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,'_'},[{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  442:                          [local]),
  443:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  444:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  445:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  446:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported,[1]),
  447:     ?CT(?MODULE,local,[1]),
  448:     ?CT(?MODULE,local2,[1]),
  449:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  450:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  451:     ?RF(erlang,phash2,2,997),
  452:     ?RT(?MODULE,local_tail,1),
  453:     ?RF(?MODULE,local_tail,1,[1,997]),
  454:     ?RF(?MODULE,local2,1,[1,997]),
  455:     ?RT(?MODULE,local,1),
  456:     ?RF(?MODULE,local,1,[1,1,997]),
  457:     ?RT(?MODULE,exported,1),
  458:     ?RF(?MODULE,exported,1,[1,1,1,997]),
  459:     ?RF(?MODULE,exported_wrap,1,[1,1,1,997]),
  460:     ?RT(?MODULE,slave,2),
  461:     shutdown(),
  462:     ?NM,
  463: 
  464:     %% Test a regression where turning off return_to tracing
  465:     %% on yourself would cause a segfault.
  466:     Pid = setup([call,return_to]),
  467:     erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},[],[local]),
  468:     apply_slave(erlang,trace,[Pid, false, [all]]),
  469:     shutdown(),
  470:     ok.
  471: 
  472: on_and_off_test() ->
  473:     Pid = setup([call]),
  474:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,local_tail,1},[],[local]),
  475:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  476:     LocalTail = fun() ->
  477:                         local_tail(1)
  478:                 end,
  479:     [1,997] = lambda_slave(LocalTail),
  480:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  481:     erlang_trace(Pid,true,[return_to]),
  482:     [1,997] = lambda_slave(LocalTail),
  483:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  484:     ?RT(?MODULE,_,_),
  485:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,local_tail,1},[],[global]),
  486:     [1,997] = lambda_slave(LocalTail),
  487:     ?NM,
  488:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},[],[global]),
  489:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  490:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  491:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},[],[local]),
  492:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  493:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  494:     ?RT(?MODULE,slave,2),
  495:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},[],[local]),
  496:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  497:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  498:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  499:     ?RT(?MODULE,local_tail,1),
  500:     ?RT(?MODULE,slave,2),
  501:     erlang_trace(Pid,true,[timestamp]),
  502:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  503:     ?CTT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  504:     ?CTT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  505:     ?RTT(?MODULE,local_tail,1),
  506:     ?RTT(?MODULE,slave,2),
  507:     erlang_trace(Pid,false,[return_to,timestamp]),
  508:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  509:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  510:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  511:     erlang_trace(Pid,true,[return_to]),
  512:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},[],[]),
  513:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  514:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  515:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  516:     ?RT(?MODULE,slave,2),
  517:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},[],[]),
  518:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  519:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  520:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  521:     shutdown(),
  522:     erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[local]),
  523:     N = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},true,[local]),
  524:     case erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},false,[local]) of
  525:         N ->
  526:             ok;
  527:         Else ->
  528:             exit({number_mismatch, {expected, N}, {got, Else}})
  529:     end,
  530:     case erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},false,[local]) of
  531:         N ->
  532:             ok;
  533:         Else2 ->
  534:             exit({number_mismatch, {expected, N}, {got, Else2}})
  535:     end,
  536:     M = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},true,[]),
  537:     case erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},false,[]) of
  538:         M ->
  539:             ok;
  540:         Else3 ->
  541:             exit({number_mismatch, {expected, N}, {got, Else3}})
  542:     end,
  543:     case erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},false,[]) of
  544:         M ->
  545:             ok;
  546:         Else4 ->
  547:             exit({number_mismatch, {expected, N}, {got, Else4}})
  548:     end,
  549:     ?NM,
  550:     ok.
  551: 
  552: systematic_on_off(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  553:     setup([call]),
  554:     Local = combinations([local,meta,call_count,call_time]),
  555:     [systematic_on_off_1(Flags) || Flags <- Local],
  556: 
  557:     %% Make sure that we don't get any trace messages when trace
  558:     %% is supposed to be off.
  559:     receive_no_next(500).
  560: 
  561: systematic_on_off_1(Local) ->
  562:     io:format("~p\n", [Local]),
  563: 
  564:     %% Global off.
  565:     verify_trace_info(false, []),
  566:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, true, Local),
  567:     verify_trace_info(false, Local),
  568:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, false, [global]),
  569:     verify_trace_info(false, Local),
  570:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, false, Local),
  571:     verify_trace_info(false, []),
  572: 
  573:     %% Global on.
  574:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, true, [global]),
  575:     verify_trace_info(true, []),
  576:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, false, Local),
  577:     verify_trace_info(true, []),
  578:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, false, [global]),
  579:     verify_trace_info(false, []),
  580: 
  581:     %% Implicitly turn off global call trace.
  582:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, true, [global]),
  583:     verify_trace_info(true, []),
  584:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, true, Local),
  585:     verify_trace_info(false, Local),
  586: 
  587:     %% Implicitly turn off local call trace.
  588:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, true, [global]),
  589:     verify_trace_info(true, []),
  590: 
  591:     %% Turn off global call trace. Everything should be off now.
  592:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, false, [global]),
  593:     verify_trace_info(false, []),
  594: 
  595:     ok.
  596: 
  597: verify_trace_info(Global, Local) ->
  598:     case erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, all) of
  599:         {all,false} ->
  600:             false = Global,
  601:             [] = Local;
  602:         {all,Ps} ->
  603:             io:format("~p\n", [Ps]),
  604:             [verify_trace_info(P, Global, Local) || P <- Ps]
  605:     end,
  606:     global_call(Global, Local),
  607:     local_call(Local),
  608:     ok.
  609: 
  610: verify_trace_info({traced,global}, true, []) -> ok;
  611: verify_trace_info({traced,local}, false, _) -> ok;
  612: verify_trace_info({match_spec,[]}, _, _) -> ok;
  613: verify_trace_info({meta_match_spec,[]}, _, _) -> ok;
  614: verify_trace_info({LocalFlag,Bool}, _, Local) when is_boolean(Bool) ->
  615:     try
  616:         Bool = lists:member(LocalFlag, Local)
  617:     catch
  618:         error:_ ->
  619:             ct:fail("Line ~p: {~p,~p}, false, ~p\n", [?LINE,LocalFlag,Bool,Local])
  620:     end;
  621: verify_trace_info({meta,Pid}, false, Local) when is_pid(Pid) ->
  622:     true = lists:member(meta, Local);
  623: verify_trace_info({call_time,_}, false, Local) ->
  624:     true = lists:member(call_time, Local);
  625: verify_trace_info({call_count,_}, false, Local) ->
  626:     true = lists:member(call_time, Local).
  627: 
  628: global_call(Global, Local) ->
  629:     apply_slave(?MODULE, exported_wrap, [global_call]),
  630:     case Global of
  631:         false ->
  632:             recv_local_call(Local, [global_call]);
  633:         true ->
  634:             ?CT(?MODULE, exported_wrap, [global_call])
  635:     end.
  636: 
  637: local_call(Local) ->
  638:     lambda_slave(fun() -> exported_wrap(local_call) end),
  639:     recv_local_call(Local, [local_call]).
  640: 
  641: recv_local_call(Local, Args) ->
  642:     case lists:member(local, Local) of
  643:         false ->
  644:             ok;
  645:         true ->
  646:             ?CT(?MODULE, exported_wrap, Args)
  647:     end,
  648:     case lists:member(meta, Local) of
  649:         false ->
  650:             ok;
  651:         true ->
  652:             ?CTT(?MODULE, exported_wrap, Args)
  653:     end,
  654:     ok.
  655: 
  656: combinations([_]=One) ->
  657:     [One];
  658: combinations([H|T]) ->
  659:     Cs = combinations(T),
  660:     [[H|C] || C <- Cs] ++ Cs.
  661: 
  662: stack_grow_test() ->    
  663:     setup([call,return_to]),
  664:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,loop,4},
  665:                              [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],[local]),
  666:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  667:     Num = 1 bsl 15,
  668:     Fun = 
  669:     fun(_F,0) -> ok; 
  670:        (F,N) -> 
  671:             receive _A -> 
  672:                         receive _B -> 
  673:                                     receive _C ->
  674:                                                 F(F,N-1) 
  675:                                     end
  676:                         end 
  677:             end 
  678:     end, 
  679:     apply_slave_async(?MODULE,loop,[{hej,hopp},[a,b,c],4.5,Num]),
  680:     Fun(Fun,Num + 1),
  681:     ?NM, 
  682:     ok.
  683: 
  684: 
  685: info_test() ->
  686:     Flags1 = lists:sort([call,return_to]),
  687:     Pid = setup(Flags1),
  688:     Prog = [{['$1'],[{is_integer,'$1'}],[{message, false}]},
  689:             {'_',[],[]}],
  690:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},Prog,[local]),
  691:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  692:     Self = self(),
  693:     {flags,L} = erlang_trace_info(Pid,flags),
  694:     case lists:sort(L) of
  695:         Flags1 ->
  696:             ok;
  697:         Wrong1 ->
  698:             exit({bad_result, {erlang,trace_info,[Pid,flags]},
  699:                   {expected, Flags1}, {got, Wrong1}})
  700:     end,
  701:     {tracer,Tracer} = erlang_trace_info(Pid,tracer),
  702:     case Tracer of
  703:         Self ->
  704:             ok;
  705:         Wrong2 ->
  706:             exit({bad_result, {erlang,trace_info,[Pid,tracer]},
  707:                   {expected, Self}, {got, Wrong2}})
  708:     end,
  709:     {traced,local} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},traced),
  710:     {match_spec, MS} = 
  711:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},match_spec),
  712:     case MS of
  713:         Prog ->
  714:             ok;
  715:         Wrong3 ->
  716:             exit({bad_result, {erlang,trace_info,
  717:                                [{?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},
  718:                                 match_spec]},
  719:                   {expected, Prog}, {got, Wrong3}})
  720:     end,
  721:     erlang:garbage_collect(self()),
  722:     receive
  723:     after 1 ->
  724:               ok
  725:     end,
  726:     io:format("~p~n",[MS]),
  727:     {match_spec,MS2} = 
  728:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},match_spec),
  729:     io:format("~p~n",[MS2]),
  730:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},[],[]),
  731:     {traced,global} = 
  732:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},traced),
  733:     {match_spec,[]} = 
  734:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},match_spec),
  735:     {traced,undefined} = 
  736:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,2},traced),
  737:     {match_spec,undefined} = 
  738:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,2},match_spec),
  739:     {traced,false} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported,1},traced),
  740:     {match_spec,false} = 
  741:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported,1},match_spec),
  742:     shutdown(),
  743:     ok.
  744: 
  745: delete_test(Config) ->
  746:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  747:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  748:     File = filename:join(Data, "trace_local_dummy"),
  749:     {ok,trace_local_dummy} = c:c(File, [{outdir,Priv}]),
  750:     code:purge(trace_local_dummy),
  751:     code:delete(trace_local_dummy),
  752:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern({trace_local_dummy,'_','_'},true,[local]),
  753:     ?NM,
  754:     ok.
  755: 
  756: 
  757: 
  758: %%% exception_test %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  759: 
  760: exception_test(Opts) ->
  761:     {ProcFlags,PatFlags} = 
  762:     case proplists:get_bool(meta, Opts) of
  763:         true  -> {[timestamp],[meta]};
  764:         false -> {[call,return_to,timestamp],[local]}
  765:     end,
  766:     case proplists:get_bool(nocatch, Opts) of
  767:         false ->
  768:             Exceptions = exceptions(),
  769:             exception_test_setup(ProcFlags, PatFlags),
  770:             lists:foreach(
  771:               fun ({Func,Args}) ->
  772:                       exception_test(Opts, Func, Args)
  773:               end,
  774:               Exceptions),
  775:             shutdown();
  776:         true ->
  777:             Exceptions = exceptions(),
  778:             try
  779:                 %% suppress  =ERROR REPORT=== emulator messages
  780:                 ok = logger:add_primary_filter(suppress_log_spam, {
  781:                     fun(#{meta := #{error_logger := #{emulator := true, tag := error}}}, _) ->
  782:                         stop;
  783:                     (_Meta, _Msg) ->
  784:                         ignore
  785:                     end, ok}),
  786:                 lists:foreach(
  787:                   fun ({Func,Args}) ->
  788:                           exception_test_setup(
  789:                             [procs|ProcFlags],
  790:                             PatFlags),
  791:                           exception_test(Opts, Func, Args),
  792:                           shutdown()
  793:                   end,
  794:                   Exceptions)
  795:             after
  796:                 %% remove the suppression for ERROR REPORTS
  797:                 ok = logger:remove_primary_filter(suppress_log_spam)
  798:             end
  799:     end,
  800:     ok.
  801: 
  802: exceptions() ->
  803:     Ref = make_ref(),
  804:     N   = 200000,
  805:     LiL = seq(1, N-1, N),	% Long Improper List
  806:     LL  = seq(1, N, []),  	% Long List
  807:     [{{erlang,exit},  [done]},
  808:      {{erlang,error}, [1.0]},
  809:      {{erlang,error}, [Ref,[]]},
  810:      {{erlang,throw}, [4711]},
  811:      {{erlang,'++'},    [[17],seventeen]},
  812:      {{erlang,'++'},    [Ref,[125.125]]},
  813:      {{?MODULE,match},  [ref,Ref]},
  814:      {{?MODULE,match},  [Ref,Ref]},
  815:      {{?MODULE,clause}, [ref,Ref]},
  816:      {{?MODULE,clause}, [Ref,Ref]},
  817:      {{?MODULE,id},     [4711.0]},
  818:      {{?MODULE,undef},  [[Ref|Ref]]},
  819:      {{?MODULE,lists_reverse}, [LiL,[]]},
  820:      {{?MODULE,lists_reverse}, [LL,[]]}].
  821: 
  822: exception_test_setup(ProcFlags, PatFlags) ->
  823:     Pid = setup(ProcFlags),
  824:     ct:log("=== exception_test_setup(~p, ~p): ~p~n",
  825:               [ProcFlags,PatFlags,Pid]),
  826:     Mprog = [{'_',[],[{exception_trace}]}],
  827:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, Mprog, PatFlags),
  828:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,PatFlags),
  829:     [1,1,1,1,1] =
  830:     [erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,F,A}, Mprog, PatFlags)
  831:      || {F,A} <- [{exit,1},{error,1},{error,2},{throw,1},{'++',2}]],
  832:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({lists,reverse,2}, Mprog, PatFlags),
  833:     ok.
  834: 
  835: -record(exc_opts, {nocatch=false, meta=false}).
  836: 
  837: exception_test(Opts, Func0, Args0) ->
  838:     ct:log("=== exception_test(~p, ~p, ~p)~n",
  839:               [Opts,Func0,abbr(Args0)]),
  840:     Apply = proplists:get_bool(apply, Opts),
  841:     Function = proplists:get_bool(function, Opts),
  842:     Nocatch = proplists:get_bool(nocatch, Opts),
  843:     Meta = proplists:get_bool(meta, Opts),
  844:     ExcOpts = #exc_opts{nocatch=Nocatch,meta=Meta},
  845: 
  846:     %% Func0 and Args0 are for the innermost call, now we will
  847:     %% wrap them in wrappers...
  848:     {Func1,Args1} =
  849:         case Function of
  850:             true  -> {fun(F, As) -> exc(F, As) end, [Func0,Args0]};
  851:             false -> {Func0,Args0}
  852:         end,
  853: 
  854:     {Func,Args} = 
  855:         case Apply of
  856:             true  -> {{erlang,apply},[Func1,Args1]};
  857:             false -> {Func1,Args1}
  858:         end,
  859: 
  860:     R1 = exc_slave(ExcOpts, Func, Args),
  861:     Stack2 = [{?MODULE,exc_top,3,[]},{?MODULE,slave,2,[]}],
  862:     Stack3 = [{?MODULE,exc,2,[]}|Stack2],
  863:     Rs = 
  864:     case x_exc_top(ExcOpts, Func, Args) of % Emulation
  865:         {crash,{Reason,Stack}}=R when is_list(Stack) ->
  866:             [R,
  867:              {crash,{Reason,Stack++Stack2}},
  868:              {crash,{Reason,Stack++Stack3}}];
  869:         R ->
  870:             [R]
  871:     end,
  872:     exception_validate(R1, Rs),
  873:     case R1 of
  874:         {crash,Crash} ->
  875:             expect({trace_ts,exit,Crash});
  876:         _ when not Meta ->
  877:             expect({rtt,{?MODULE,slave,2}});
  878:         _ ->
  879:             ok
  880:     end,
  881:     expect({nm}).
  882: 
  883: exception_validate(R0, Rs0) ->
  884:     R = clean_location(R0),
  885:     Rs = [clean_location(E) || E <- Rs0],
  886:     exception_validate_1(R, Rs).
  887: 
  888: exception_validate_1(R1, [R2|Rs]) ->
  889:     case [R1|R2] of
  890:         [R|R] ->
  891:             ok;
  892:         [{crash,{badarg,[{lists,reverse,[L1a,L1b],_}|T]}}|
  893:          {crash,{badarg,[{lists,reverse,[L2a,L2b],_}|T]}}] ->
  894:             same({crash,{badarg,[{lists,reverse,
  895:                                   [lists:reverse(L1b, L1a),[]],[]}|T]}},
  896:                  {crash,{badarg,[{lists,reverse,
  897:                                   [lists:reverse(L2b, L2a),[]],[]}|T]}});
  898:         _ when is_list(Rs), Rs =/= [] ->
  899:             exception_validate(R1, Rs)
  900:     end.
  901: 
  902: clean_location({crash,{Reason,Stk0}}) ->
  903:     Stk = [{M,F,A,[]} || {M,F,A,_} <- Stk0],
  904:     {crash,{Reason,Stk}};
  905: clean_location(Term) -> Term.
  906: 
  907: concurrency(_Config) ->
  908:     N = erlang:system_info(schedulers),
  909: 
  910:     %% Spawn 2*N processes that spin in a tight infinite loop,
  911:     %% and one process that will turn on and off local call
  912:     %% trace on the infinite_loop/0 function. We expect the
  913:     %% emulator to crash if there is a memory barrier bug or
  914:     %% if an aligned word-sized write is not atomic.
  915: 
  916:     Ps0 = [spawn_monitor(fun() -> infinite_loop() end) ||
  917:            _ <- lists:seq(1, 2*N)],
  918:     OnAndOff = fun() -> concurrency_on_and_off() end,
  919:     Ps1 = [spawn_monitor(OnAndOff)|Ps0],
  920:     timer:sleep(1000),
  921: 
  922:     %% Now spawn off N more processes that turn on off and off
  923:     %% a local trace pattern.
  924:     Ps = [spawn_monitor(OnAndOff) || _ <- lists:seq(1, N)] ++ Ps1,
  925:     timer:sleep(1000),
  926: 
  927:     %% Clean up.
  928:     [exit(Pid, kill) || {Pid,_} <- Ps],
  929:     [receive
  930:          {'DOWN',Ref,process,Pid,killed} -> ok
  931:      end || {Pid,Ref} <- Ps],
  932:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,infinite_loop,0}, false, [local]),
  933:     ok.
  934: 
  935: concurrency_on_and_off() ->
  936:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,infinite_loop,0}, true, [local]),
  937:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,infinite_loop,0}, false, [local]),
  938:     concurrency_on_and_off().
  939: 
  940: infinite_loop() ->
  941:     infinite_loop().
  942: 
  943: %%% Tracee target functions %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  944: %%%
  945: 
  946: loop(D1,D2,D3,0) ->
  947:     io:format("~p~n",[[D1,D2,D3]]),
  948:     0;
  949: loop(D1,D2,D3,N) ->
  950:     max(N,loop(D1,D2,D3,N-1)).
  951: 
  952: exported_wrap(Val) ->
  953:     exported(Val).
  954: 
  955: exported(Val) ->
  956:     [Val | local(Val)]. %% Non tail recursive local call
  957: 
  958: local(Val) ->
  959:     [Val | local2(Val)]. %% Non tail recursive local call
  960: 
  961: local2(Val) ->
  962:     local_tail(Val). %% Tail recursive call
  963: 
  964: local_tail(Val) ->
  965:     [Val , erlang:phash2(1,1023)].
  966: 
  967: 
  968: 
  969: %%% exc_slave/3 tracee target functions %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  970: %%%
  971: 
  972: exc_top(ExcOpts, Func, Args) ->
  973:     case ExcOpts#exc_opts.nocatch of
  974:         false ->
  975:             try exc_jump(Func, Args) of
  976:                 Value ->
  977:                     {value,Value}
  978:             catch
  979:                 Class:Reason ->
  980:                     {Class,Reason}
  981:             end;
  982:         true ->
  983:             {value,exc_jump(Func, Args)}
  984:     end.
  985: 
  986: %% x_* functions emulate the non-x_* ones.
  987: %% x_* functions below x_exc_top
  988: %% return {value,Value} or {Class,Reason}.
  989: %% The only possible place for exception
  990: %% is below exc/2.
  991: x_exc_top(ExcOpts, Func, Args) ->
  992:     Rtt = not ExcOpts#exc_opts.meta,
  993:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc_top},[ExcOpts,Func,Args]}),
  994:     case x_exc_jump(ExcOpts, Func, Args) of
  995:         Result when not ExcOpts#exc_opts.nocatch ->
  996:             expect([Rtt,{rtt,{?MODULE,exc_top,3}},
  997:                     ?LINE,{rft,{?MODULE,exc_top,3},Result}]),
  998:             Result;
  999:         {value,_}=Result ->
 1000: 
 1001:             expect([Rtt,{rtt,{?MODULE,exc_top,3}},
 1002:                     ?LINE,{rft,{?MODULE,exc_top,3},Result}]),
 1003:             Result;
 1004:         {exit,Reason}=CR ->
 1005:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc_top,3},CR}),
 1006:             {crash,Reason};
 1007:         {error,Reason}=CR ->
 1008:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc_top,3},CR}),
 1009:             {crash,{Reason,x_exc_stacktrace()}};
 1010:         CR ->
 1011:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc_top,3},CR}),
 1012:             {crash,CR}
 1013:     end.
 1014: 
 1015: exc_jump(Func, Args) ->
 1016:     exc(Func, Args, jump).
 1017: 
 1018: x_exc_jump(ExcOpts, Func, Args) ->
 1019:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc_jump},[Func,Args]}),
 1020:     case x_exc(ExcOpts, Func, Args, jump) of
 1021:         {value,Value}=Result ->
 1022:             expect({rft,{?MODULE,exc_jump,2},Value}),
 1023:             Result;
 1024:         CR ->
 1025:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc_jump,2},CR}),
 1026:             CR
 1027:     end.
 1028: 
 1029: exc(Func, Args, jump) ->
 1030:     exc(Func, Args, do);
 1031: exc(Func, Args, do) ->
 1032:     exc(Func, Args).
 1033: 
 1034: x_exc(ExcOpts, Func, Args, jump) ->
 1035:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc},[Func,Args,jump]}),
 1036:     case x_exc(ExcOpts, Func, Args, do) of
 1037:         {value,Value}=Result ->
 1038:             expect({rft,{?MODULE,exc,3},Value}),
 1039:             Result;
 1040:         CR ->
 1041:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc,3},CR}),
 1042:             CR
 1043:     end;
 1044: x_exc(ExcOpts, Func, Args, do) ->
 1045:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc},[Func,Args,do]}),
 1046:     case x_exc(ExcOpts, Func, Args) of
 1047:         {value,Value}=Result ->
 1048:             expect({rft,{?MODULE,exc,3},Value}),
 1049:             Result;
 1050:         CR ->
 1051:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc,3},CR}),
 1052:             CR
 1053:     end.
 1054: 
 1055: exc({erlang,apply}, [{M,F},A]) ->
 1056:     erlang:apply(M, F, id(A));
 1057: exc({erlang,apply}, [F,A]) ->
 1058:     erlang:apply(F, id(A));
 1059: exc({erlang,error}, [E]) ->
 1060:     erlang:error(id(E));
 1061: exc({erlang,error}, [E,S]) ->
 1062:     erlang:error(E, id(S));
 1063: exc({erlang,exit}, [E]) ->
 1064:     erlang:exit(id(E));
 1065: exc({erlang,throw}, [E]) ->
 1066:     erlang:throw(id(E));
 1067: exc({erlang,'++'}, [A,B]) ->
 1068:     erlang:'++'(A, id(B));
 1069: exc({?MODULE,match}, [A,B]) ->
 1070:     match(A, id(B));
 1071: exc({?MODULE,clause}, [A,B]) ->
 1072:     clause(A, id(B));
 1073: exc({?MODULE,id}, [E]) ->
 1074:     id(id(E));
 1075: exc({?MODULE,undef}, [E]) ->
 1076:     undef(id(E));
 1077: exc({?MODULE,lists_reverse}, [A,B]) ->
 1078:     lists_reverse(A, id(B));
 1079: exc(Func, [A,B]) when is_function(Func, 2) ->
 1080:     Func(A, id(B)).
 1081: 
 1082: x_exc(ExcOpts, {erlang,apply}=Func0, [{_,_}=Func,Args]=Args0) ->
 1083:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc},[Func0,Args0]}),
 1084:     x_exc_body(ExcOpts, Func, Args, true);
 1085: x_exc(ExcOpts, {erlang,apply}=Func0, [Func,Args]=Args0) 
 1086:   when is_function(Func, 2)->
 1087:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc},[Func0,Args0]}),
 1088:     x_exc_func(ExcOpts, Func, Args, Args);
 1089: x_exc(ExcOpts, {_,_}=Func, Args) ->
 1090:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc},[Func,Args]}),
 1091:     x_exc_body(ExcOpts, Func, Args, false);
 1092: x_exc(ExcOpts, Func0, [_,Args]=Args0)
 1093:   when is_function(Func0, 2) ->
 1094:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc},[Func0,Args0]}),
 1095:     x_exc_func(ExcOpts, Func0, Args0, Args).
 1096: 
 1097: x_exc_func(ExcOpts, Func, [Func1,Args1]=Args, Id) ->
 1098:     %% Assumes the called fun =:= fun exc/2,
 1099:     %% will utterly fail otherwise.
 1100:     Rtt = not ExcOpts#exc_opts.meta,
 1101:     {module,M} = erlang:fun_info(Func, module),
 1102:     {name,F} = erlang:fun_info(Func, name),
 1103:     expect([{ctt,{?MODULE,id},[Id]},
 1104:             ?LINE,{rft,{?MODULE,id,1},Id},
 1105:             ?LINE,Rtt,{rtt,{?MODULE,exc,2}},
 1106:             ?LINE,{ctt,{M,F},Args}]),
 1107:     case x_exc(ExcOpts, Func1, Args1) of
 1108:         {value,Value}=Result ->
 1109:             expect([{rft,{M,F,2},Value},
 1110:                     ?LINE,{rft,{?MODULE,exc,2},Value}]),
 1111:             Result;
 1112:         CR ->
 1113:             expect([{eft,{M,F,2},CR},
 1114:                     ?LINE,{eft,{?MODULE,exc,2},CR}]),
 1115:             CR
 1116:     end.
 1117: 
 1118: x_exc_body(ExcOpts, {M,F}=Func, Args, Apply) ->
 1119:     Nocatch = ExcOpts#exc_opts.nocatch,
 1120:     Rtt = not ExcOpts#exc_opts.meta,
 1121:     Id = case Apply of
 1122:              true  -> Args;
 1123:              false -> lists:last(Args)
 1124:          end,
 1125:     expect([{ctt,{?MODULE,id},[Id]},
 1126:             ?LINE,{rft,{?MODULE,id,1},Id},
 1127:             ?LINE,Rtt,{rtt,{?MODULE,exc,2}},
 1128:             ?LINE,{ctt,{M,F},Args}]),
 1129:     Arity = length(Args),
 1130:     try exc(Func, Args) of
 1131:         Value ->
 1132:             x_exc_value(Rtt, M, F, Args, Arity, Value),
 1133:             case expect() of
 1134:                 {rtt,{M,F,Arity}} when Rtt, Apply ->
 1135:                     %% We may get the above when
 1136:                     %% applying a BIF.
 1137:                     expect({rft,{?MODULE,exc,2},Value});
 1138:                 {rtt,{?MODULE,exc,2}} when Rtt, not Apply ->
 1139:                     %% We may get the above when
 1140:                     %% calling a BIF.
 1141:                     expect({rft,{?MODULE,exc,2},Value});
 1142:                 {rft,{?MODULE,exc,2},Value} ->
 1143:                     ok
 1144:             end,
 1145:             {value,Value}
 1146:     catch
 1147:         throw:Thrown:Stk when Nocatch ->
 1148:             put(get_stacktrace, Stk),
 1149:             CR = {error,{nocatch,Thrown}},
 1150:             x_exc_exception(Rtt, M, F, Args, Arity, CR),
 1151:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc,2},CR}),
 1152:             CR;
 1153:         Class:Reason:Stk ->
 1154:             put(get_stacktrace, Stk),
 1155:             CR = {Class,Reason},
 1156:             x_exc_exception(Rtt, M, F, Args, Arity, CR),
 1157:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc,2},CR}),
 1158:             CR
 1159:     end.
 1160: 
 1161: x_exc_value(Rtt, ?MODULE, lists_reverse, [La,Lb], 2, R) ->
 1162:     L = lists:reverse(Lb, La),
 1163:     expect([fun ({ctt,{lists,reverse},[L1,L2]}) ->
 1164:                     same(L, lists:reverse(L2, L1)),
 1165:                     next;
 1166:                 (Msg) ->
 1167:                     same({rft,{lists,reverse,2},R}, Msg),
 1168:                     same(R, lists:reverse(L, [])),
 1169:                     done
 1170:             end,
 1171:             ?LINE,Rtt,{rtt,{?MODULE,lists_reverse,2}},
 1172:             ?LINE,{rft,{?MODULE,lists_reverse,2},R}]);
 1173: x_exc_value(_Rtt, M, F, _, Arity, Value) ->
 1174:     expect({rft,{M,F,Arity},Value}).
 1175: 
 1176: x_exc_exception(_Rtt, ?MODULE, lists_reverse, [La,Lb], 2, CR) ->
 1177:     L = lists:reverse(Lb, La),
 1178:     expect([fun ({ctt,{lists,reverse},[L1,L2]}) ->
 1179:                     same(L, lists:reverse(L2, L1)),
 1180:                     next;
 1181:                 (Msg) ->
 1182:                     same({eft,{lists,reverse,2},CR}, Msg),
 1183:                     done
 1184:             end,
 1185:             ?LINE,{eft,{?MODULE,lists_reverse,2},CR}]);
 1186: x_exc_exception(Rtt, ?MODULE, undef, [_], 1, {Class,Reason}=CR) ->
 1187:     expect([{ctt,{erlang,Class},[Reason]},
 1188:             ?LINE,{eft,{erlang,Class,1},CR},
 1189:             ?LINE,Rtt,{rtt,{error_handler,crash,1}},
 1190:             ?LINE,{eft,{?MODULE,undef,1},CR}]);
 1191: x_exc_exception(_Rtt, M, F, _, Arity, CR) ->
 1192:     expect({eft,{M,F,Arity},CR}).
 1193: 
 1194: x_exc_stacktrace() ->
 1195:     x_exc_stacktrace(get(get_stacktrace)).
 1196: 
 1197: %% Truncate stacktrace to below exc/2
 1198: x_exc_stacktrace([{?MODULE,x_exc,4,_}|_]) -> [];
 1199: x_exc_stacktrace([{?MODULE,x_exc_func,4,_}|_]) -> [];
 1200: x_exc_stacktrace([{?MODULE,x_exc_body,4,_}|_]) -> [];
 1201: x_exc_stacktrace([{?MODULE,exc,2,_}|_]) -> [];
 1202: x_exc_stacktrace([H|T]) ->
 1203:     [H|x_exc_stacktrace(T)].
 1204: 
 1205: 
 1206: 
 1207: match(A, B) ->
 1208:     A = B.
 1209: 
 1210: clause(A, A) ->
 1211:     A.
 1212: 
 1213: id(Id) ->
 1214:     Id.
 1215: 
 1216: undef(X) ->
 1217:     ?MODULE:undef(X, X). % undef
 1218: 
 1219: lists_reverse(A, B) ->
 1220:     Res = lists:reverse(A, B),
 1221:     _ = (catch abs(A)),
 1222:     Res.
 1223: 
 1224: 
 1225: 
 1226: %%% Tracee (slave) handling %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1227: %%%
 1228: 
 1229: slave(Dest, Sync) ->
 1230:     Dest ! Sync,
 1231:     receive
 1232:         {From,Tag,{apply,M,F,A}} when is_pid(From) ->
 1233:             ?dbgformat("Apply: ~p:~p/~p (~p)~n",[M,F,length(A),A]),
 1234:             Res = apply(M,F,A),
 1235:             ?dbgformat("done Apply: ~p:~p/~p (~p)~n",[M,F,length(A),A]),
 1236:             From ! {Tag,Res},
 1237:             slave(From, Tag);
 1238:         {From,Tag,{lambda,Fun}} when is_pid(From) ->
 1239:             Res = Fun(),
 1240:             From ! {Tag,Res},
 1241:             slave(From, Tag);
 1242:         {From,Tag,{exc_top,Catch,Func,Args}} when is_pid(From) ->
 1243:             ?dbgformat("Exc: ~p ~p~p ~n",[Catch,Func,Args]),
 1244:             Res = exc_top(Catch, Func, Args),
 1245:             ?dbgformat("done Exc: ~p ~p~p ~n",[Catch,Func,Args]),
 1246:             From ! {Tag,Res},
 1247:             slave(From,Tag);
 1248:         die ->
 1249:             exit(normal)
 1250:     end.
 1251: 
 1252: setup(ProcFlags) ->
 1253:     trace_off(),
 1254:     flush(100),
 1255:     Self = self(),
 1256:     Sync = make_ref(),
 1257:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> slave(Self, Sync) end),
 1258:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 1259:     receive 
 1260:         Sync ->
 1261:             put(slave, {Pid,Mref}),
 1262:             case ProcFlags of
 1263:                 [] -> ok;
 1264:                 _ ->
 1265:                     erlang_trace(Pid, true, ProcFlags)
 1266:             end,
 1267:             Pid
 1268:     end.
 1269: 
 1270: shutdown() ->
 1271:     trace_off(),
 1272:     case get(slave) of
 1273:         {Pid,Mref} ->
 1274:             try erlang:is_process_alive(Pid) of
 1275:                 true ->
 1276:                     Pid ! die,
 1277:                     receive
 1278:                         {'DOWN',Mref,process,Pid,Reason} ->
 1279:                             Reason
 1280:                     end;
 1281:                 _ ->
 1282:                     not_alive
 1283:             catch _:_ ->
 1284:                     undefined
 1285:             end;
 1286:         _ ->
 1287:             undefined
 1288:     end.
 1289: 
 1290: trace_off() ->
 1291:     erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[]),
 1292:     erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[local]),
 1293:     erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[meta]),
 1294:     erlang_trace(all, false, [all]).
 1295: 
 1296: 
 1297: apply_slave_async(M,F,A) ->
 1298:     {Pid,Mref} = get(slave),
 1299:     spawn(?MODULE,apply_slave_async,[M,F,A,Pid,Mref]),
 1300:     Pid.
 1301: 
 1302: apply_slave_async(M,F,A,Pid,Mref) ->
 1303:     Tag = make_ref(),
 1304:     Pid ! {self(),Tag,{apply,M,F,A}},
 1305:     result(Tag, Mref).
 1306: 
 1307: apply_slave(M,F,A) ->
 1308:     request({apply,M,F,A}).
 1309: 
 1310: lambda_slave(Fun) ->
 1311:     request({lambda,Fun}).
 1312: 
 1313: exc_slave(Opts, Func, Args) ->
 1314:     try request({exc_top,Opts,Func,Args})
 1315:     catch
 1316:         Reason ->
 1317:             {crash,Reason}
 1318:     end.
 1319: 
 1320: request(Request) ->
 1321:     Tag = make_ref(),
 1322:     {Pid,Mref} = get(slave),
 1323:     Pid ! {self(),Tag,Request},
 1324:     result(Tag, Mref).
 1325: 
 1326: result(Tag, Mref) ->
 1327:     receive
 1328:         {Tag,Result} ->
 1329:             receive
 1330:                 Tag ->
 1331:                     Result
 1332:             end;
 1333:         {'DOWN',Mref,process,_Pid,Reason} ->
 1334:             throw(Reason)
 1335:     end.
 1336: 
 1337: 
 1338: 
 1339: %%% Some receive helpers %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1340: %%%
 1341: 
 1342: receive_next() ->
 1343:     receive_next(?DEFAULT_RECEIVE_TIMEOUT).
 1344: 
 1345: receive_next(TO) ->
 1346:     receive
 1347:         M ->
 1348:             M
 1349:     after TO ->
 1350:               ct:fail(timeout)
 1351:     end.
 1352: 
 1353: receive_no_next(TO) ->
 1354:     receive M ->
 1355:                 ct:fail({unexpected_message,[M|flush(TO)]})
 1356:     after TO ->
 1357:               ok
 1358:     end.
 1359: 
 1360: flush(T) ->
 1361:     receive
 1362:         M ->
 1363:             [M|flush(T)]
 1364:     after T ->
 1365:               []
 1366:     end.
 1367: 
 1368: 
 1369: 
 1370: %%% Helpers %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1371: %%%
 1372: 
 1373: %% Do not build garbage
 1374: %%
 1375: seq(M, N, R) when M =< N ->
 1376:     seq(M, N-1, [N|R]);
 1377: seq(_, _, R) -> R.
 1378: 
 1379: %% Do not call traced lists:reverse
 1380: reverse(L) ->
 1381:     reverse(L, []).
 1382: %%
 1383: reverse([], R) -> R;
 1384: reverse([H|T], R) ->
 1385:     reverse(T, [H|R]).
 1386: 
 1387: %% Abbreviate large complex terms to avoid croaking printout
 1388: %%
 1389: abbr(Term) ->
 1390:     abbr(Term, 20).
 1391: %%
 1392: abbr(Tuple, N) when is_tuple(Tuple) ->
 1393:     list_to_tuple(abbr_tuple(Tuple, N, 1));
 1394: abbr(List, N) when is_list(List) ->
 1395:     abbr_list(List, N, []);
 1396: abbr(Term, _) -> Term.
 1397: %%
 1398: abbr_tuple(Tuple, N, J) when J =< size(Tuple) ->
 1399:     if J > N; N =< 0 ->
 1400:            ['...'];
 1401:        true ->
 1402:            [abbr(element(J, Tuple), N-1)|abbr_tuple(Tuple, J+1, N)]
 1403:     end;
 1404: abbr_tuple(_, _, _) ->
 1405:     [].
 1406: %%
 1407: abbr_list(_, 0, R) ->
 1408:     case io_lib:printable_list(R) of
 1409:         true ->
 1410:             reverse(R, "...");
 1411:         false ->
 1412:             reverse(R, '...')
 1413:     end;
 1414: abbr_list([H|T], N, R) ->
 1415:     M = N-1,
 1416:     abbr_list(T, M, [abbr(H, M)|R]);
 1417: abbr_list(T, _, R) ->
 1418:     reverse(R, T).
